page.title: 20Credits
page.content: EDUCATION IN DELABOLE. The Domesday Project. Class 3 at Delabole C.P. School have worked on the Domesday Project throughout the Summer Term 1985. All the children have visited their squares and found the work very interesting. Better than sitting in class. We sign off now: Jason Davies,Philip Sleep,Shane Binney Stephen Prescott,Lee Dungey,Gary Blanchard,Peter Osborne,Jeremy Wills, Stephen Goodman,Andrew Gregory,Matthew Haynes,James Greenaway,David Barrett, Ben Worden,Gavin Liddel,Patrick Curran Catherine Tanner,Heidi Henderson,Paula Hicks,Barbara Trewin,Caroline Squire, Rachel Davey,Nicola Binney,Joanne Bradley,Jean Amy,Kerry Ubly,Sammy Brock,Claire Binney,Sarah Pooley. Teachers: Esther Richardson and Beric and Joanna Raymond-Barker.
